#labels Featured
RDV is a visualization environment for scientific and engineering data. Below are a few of it's key features.

 * Support Local or Remote Data Sources
 * Synchronized data
 * Plotting and Charting
 * Video and Image Viewing
 * Event Markers
 * Extensions

If you want to do something RDV can't do, use the feature request tracker to view current feature requests or to request a new feature.
